name: Romero Britto x DJ White Shadow

metadata.name: Tonight on the Beach
metadata.description: “Tonight on the Beach” is dedicated the vivacious culture of South Beach in Miami, Florida.  The ocean front café’s, the palm trees, champagne, technology and the beautiful company of interesting people from all over the globe. All in perfect synergy, smiling, enjoying the warm weather and shimmery sand at night time. Paul Blair adds, " As a fan of music, my favorite music at a party is always disco. Tonight on the Beach is how i do a modern twist on a party on a beach, and a disco .This is a party I would want to attend."
